properties.areaDesc: Wabash, IL; Daviess, IN; Knox, IN; Gibson, IN; Pike, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 2 at 9:27PM EST until January 8 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

White River...

.River levels have begun to crest and fall aling portions of the
White River with most areas expected to be below flood stage by
early next week.

The Flood Warning continues for
The White River at Petersburg.
* until Wednesday morning.
* At  8:30 PM Thursday the stage was 16.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It will rise to near 17.1 feet by Sunday afternoon then
begin falling. It will fall below flood stage Tuesday evening.
* At 17.0 feet...Flooding affects low agricultural lands, low oil
fields and closes Bottoms Rd...Brothers Rd and East Govenors Road
in Knox County.  In agricultural season...farmers are concerned at
this stage.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
